data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 3, Gwangju have been awarded a corner by Hyun Jae Choi.
Throw-in for Gwangju close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gwangju.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sangju Sangmu have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hyun Jae Choi signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 14, Hyun Jae Choi awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Gwangju in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Hyun Jae Choi signals a throw-in for Gwangju, close to Sangju Sangmu's area.
In the minute 16, Gwangju have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Gwangju.
Can Gwangju get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
In the minute 17, Hyun Jae Choi signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Sangju Sangmu push forward at Gwangju World Cup Stadium and Park Dong-jin gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Gwangju defence.
In the minute 21, Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hyun Jae Choi awards the home team a throw-in.
Gwangju's Kim Jeong-hwan gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 22, Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Gwangju are pushing forward but Willyan's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
In Gwangju Sangju Sangmu attack through Ko Myeong-seok. The finish is off target, however.
Hyun Jae Choi awards Gwangju a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Willyan is booked for the home team.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the home team in Gwangju.
Sangju Sangmu's Park Dong-jin breaks free at Gwangju World Cup Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
In the minute 30, Hyun Jae Choi awards Gwangju a goal kick.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Park Yong-woo for Sangju Sangmu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 33, Gwangju have a goal kick.
Gwangju to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Gwangju in Gwangju.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
In Gwangju, Heo Yong-jun of Sangju Sangmu is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 35, Hyun Jae Choi signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Kim Jin-hyeok (Sangju Sangmu) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick Gwangju.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 37, In Gwangju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Gwangju Sangju Sangmu drive forward through Park Dong-jin. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sangju Sangmu's Heo Yong-jun misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 39, Gwangju have a goal kick.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Goal! Sangju Sangmu have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Park Dong-jin.
In the minute 40, Sim Sang-min with an assist there.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Kim Jeong-hwan for Gwangju drives towards goal at Gwangju World Cup Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, In Gwangju, Gwangju push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick in a good position for Gwangju!
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Hyun Jae Choi signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Park Jin Seob (Gwangju) is making a first substitution, with Han Heui-hun replacing Willyan.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Gwangju have been awarded a corner by Hyun Jae Choi.
Lee Eu-ddeum gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gwangju.
Gwangju have been awarded a corner by Hyun Jae Choi.
In the minute 50, Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
Can Sangju Sangmu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gwangju's half?
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Gwangju.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Important block from the Gwangju defence as Heo Yong-jun fires in a strike for Sangju Sangmu.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Hyun Jae Choi.
In the minute 57, In Gwangju Sangju Sangmu attack through Kim Bo-seob. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gwangju.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kim Ju-kong is on a sub for Kim Jeong-hwan for Gwangju.
Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
Park Dong-jin (Sangju Sangmu) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 59, Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Hyun Jae Choi.
Gwangju needs to be cautious. Sangju Sangmu have an attacking throw-in.
Hyun Jae Choi awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 60, Can Sangju Sangmu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gwangju's half?
Hyun Jae Choi signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Hyun Jae Choi signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 67, Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hyun Jae Choi signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu.
Can Gwangju capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 69, Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Gwangju have a dangerous throw-in.
Hyun Jae Choi signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 73, Felipe Silva for the home team is judged to be offside.
The away team have replaced Park Se-jin with Ju-Sung Woo. This is the first substitution made today by Kim Tae-wan.
Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Gwangju at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Gwangju.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Gwangju have been awarded a corner by Hyun Jae Choi.
Gwangju are whistled for offside.
In the minute 77, Hyun Jae Choi signals a Gwangju throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half.
Park Jin Seob is making the team's third substitution at Gwangju World Cup Stadium with Yeo Bong-hun replacing Park Jun-heui.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Gwangju close to the penalty box.
In the minute 79, Gwangju's Lee Eu-ddeum gets in a shot on goal at Gwangju World Cup Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 80, Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kwon Kyung-won for Sangju Sangmu is back on the field again.
The away team replace Kim Bo-seob with Jeong Jae-Hee.
The match at Gwangju World Cup Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Kwon Kyung-won, who is down injured.
Free kick Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 83, Gwangju to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Hyun Jae Choi awards Gwangju a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
Hyun Jae Choi signals a Sangju Sangmu throw-in in Gwangju's half.
In the minute 89, Gwangju needs to be cautious. Sangju Sangmu have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
Gwangju are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Gwangju a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Gwangju.
In Gwangju, Yeo Bong-hun of Gwangju is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Gwangju will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sangju Sangmu.
That's full-time at Gwangju World Cup Stadium. The final score is 0-1.
